hackathon-description-text: Come to sunny, beautiful California and hack with us!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Tickets to a music festival - up to 300 per person.
Flight to a city of choice - up to 300 per person.
Dinner at a Michelin star restaurant - up to 300 per person.
an Apple Watch for each team member
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of IBM Watson IoT Platform on Bluemix

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: S'well bottles and Fitbits for each team member.
a Kinect for Windows 2.0 dev kit for each team member
Evernote Moleskine + Premium Evernote Subscription for a Year for each team member.
an Amazon Echo for each team member. Presented by Amazon Alexa.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Voice User Experience Using Amazon Alexa

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: an Amazon Echo (or Amazon gift card of the same value) for each team member. Presented by Button.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Button in an iOS, Android, or Web App

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: a Photon Kit for each winner. Presented by Particle.
Submissions must use App Engine as a key component of their project
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Google App Engine

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Submission must leverage at least one of Google’s ML APIs: Vision, Natural Language, Speech, Translate, or ML Services
BB-8 Droids for each winning team member. Presented by Disney.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Most Novel Use of a Physical Device

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 1st Place is 4 HTC VIVE - Virtual Reality System (split amongst 2 first place this year)

Best overall integration and use of Microsoft technology(s) will be eligible to win Surface Pro 4 w/Type Keyboard (grand prize) or Fitbit Blaze (runner up). Eligible technologies: Microsoft Azure, Windows 10 App, Kinect, Microsoft HoloLens, Microsoft Cognitive Services, and Bing API.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Overall Integration and Use of Microsoft Technology(s)

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Must use at least 2 Pitney Bowes APIs. Cannot use a competing API, defined as one with the same functionality as the Pitney Bowes APIs. The team may use any number of additional APIs or components. Free accounts may be made at
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Most Commercially Viable Solution using Pitney Bowes APIs

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Use your tech skills for good and hack online harassment! Build a software solution that can help reduce the frequency and/or severity of online harassment. Members of the winning team receive Hack Harassment Battery Packs!
$250 AWS credit.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Domain.com Swag Bags.
Das Keyboard 4 Professional Mechanical Keyboard for each team member. Sponsored by Linode.
Opportunity to attend a Monday meeting with the Maveron investment team in SF and dinner with the Maveron team.
Snowboard, longboard, or mountain bike for each member of the winning team. Sponsored by Qualtrics.
$100 Amazon Gift Cards for each member of the winning team.
Facebook-branded Fitbits for each member of the winning team
LEGO Kits for each team member. Find the API here:
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of the Mixmax API

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Demonstrate the most innovative use of Neura SDK in your iOS/ Android application.
$2000 for the best use of Amadeus' APIs in one of the following: Bringing people together, responsible travel, or seamless travel.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=475 Via Ortega, Stanford, CA 94305, USA
hackathon-description-header: Come hack with us in sunny, beautiful California!
